relation: 银 Yín * 小银 Xiǎo Yín *
은 means silver. The entire name means silver cave, possibly in reference to the game location.
pageTitle: Silver (Adventures) - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Names According to the manga, Silver's bloodtype is AB. However, this would actually make it impossible that Silver is Giovanni's son, because Giovanni's bloodtype is O and a person with bloodtype O can, no matter the bloodtype of the partner, never get a child with the bloodtype AB. Trivia Rising Badge Glacier Badge Mineral Badge Storm Badge Fog Badge Plain Badge Hive Badge Zephyr Badge To gain entrance into the Pokémon League, Silver stole all eight Johto Badges while the Gym Leaders were gone. In VS Koffing and VS Arceus I, he returned all but the Glacier and Plain Badges to their proper owners. Badges obtained Slugging It Out With Slugma Debut After Entei saved Gold, Silver,
